product_name: Screamer Phantom Polygon Face Mask - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ski like a bandit-or at least look like one with the Screamer Phantom Polygon face mask. Soft, windproof fabric guards your face and neck so you can ski at top speed without your nose freezing. Molded facemask features elastic hem cord for a stay-put fit; breathing holes at the mouth reduce condensation. Front scarf portion is made of wind- and waterproof stretch polyester; soft fleece backing feels comfortable against skin. Closeout.
short_description: Ski like a bandit-or at least look like one with the Screamer Phantom Polygon face mask. Soft, windproof fabric guards your face and neck so you can ski at top speed without your nose freezing.
